languages.text: "Лорд-инквизитор станет достойным противником, из кожи которого я прикажу изготовить лучшие сапоги. Приятно думать, что с каждым шагом я буду снова и снова втаптывать его в грязь".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-инквизитор станет достойным противником, из кожи которого я прикажу изготовить лучшие сапоги. Приятно думать, что с каждым шагом я буду снова и снова втаптывать его в грязь".

languages.text: "The Lord Inquisitor is a worthy adversary whose skin I'll have made into a fine pair of boots. It pleases me to know I will be trampling him further into the dirt with every step I take."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-инквизитор станет достойным противником, из кожи которого я прикажу изготовить лучшие сапоги. Приятно думать, что с каждым шагом я буду снова и снова втаптывать его в грязь".

traits.locale_text: "The Lord Inquisitor is a worthy adversary whose skin I will have turned into a fine pair of boots. It pleases me to know I will be further trampling him in the dirt with every step I take."
"The Lord Inquisitor is a worthy adversary whose skin I will have turned into a fine pair of boots. It pleases me to know I will be further trampling him in the dirt with every step I take."

languages.text: «El Lord Inquisidor es un adversario digno a partir de cuya piel haré un buen par de botas. Me alegrará pisotearle con cada paso».
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor is a worthy adversary whose skin I'll have made into a fine pair of boots. It pleases me to know I will be trampling him further into the dirt with every step I take."

traits.locale_text: «El Lord Inquisidor es un adversario digno a partir de cuya piel haré un buen par de botas. Me alegrará pisotearle con cada paso».

languages.text: « Le seigneur inquisiteur est un adversaire digne de ce nom dont la peau me fera une belle paire de bottes. Je me fais déjà une joie de pouvoir continuer à l'écraser à chaque pas. »
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor is a worthy adversary whose skin I'll have made into a fine pair of boots. It pleases me to know I will be trampling him further into the dirt with every step I take."

traits.locale_text: « Le seigneur inquisiteur est un adversaire digne de ce nom dont la peau me fera une belle paire de bottes. Je me fais déjà une joie de pouvoir continuer à l'écraser à chaque pas. »

languages.text: 「ロード・インクィジターは好敵手になりそうだ。奴の皮を剥ぎ取って、立派なブーツにして使ってやろう。一歩歩くごとに奴を泥の中で踏みつけてやれるなら嬉しいことこの上ないぜ」
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor is a worthy adversary whose skin I'll have made into a fine pair of boots. It pleases me to know I will be trampling him further into the dirt with every step I take."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・インクィジターは好敵手になりそうだ。奴の皮を剥ぎ取って、立派なブーツにして使ってやろう。一歩歩くごとに奴を泥の中で踏みつけてやれるなら嬉しいことこの上ないぜ」

languages.text: “大审判官是位值得尊敬的对手，我打算把他的皮剥下来，做成一双漂亮的靴子。这样我每走一步，他都会在泥巴里陷得更深，这会让我相当高兴。”
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor is a worthy adversary whose skin I'll have made into a fine pair of boots. It pleases me to know I will be trampling him further into the dirt with every step I take."

traits.locale_text: “审判长是位值得尊敬的对手，我打算把他的皮剥下来，做成一双漂亮的靴子。这样我每走一步，他都会在泥巴里陷得更深，这会让我相当高兴。”

languages.text: "Der Großinquisitor ist ein würdiger Gegner, aus dessen Haut ich mir ein Paar edle Stiefel fertigen lassen werde. Mich erfreut der Gedanke, dass ich ihn mit jedem meiner Schritte weiter im Dreck zertrample."
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor is a worthy adversary whose skin I'll have made into a fine pair of boots. It pleases me to know I will be trampling him further into the dirt with every step I take."

traits.locale_text: "Der Großinquisitor ist ein würdiger Gegner, aus dessen Haut ich mir ein Paar edle Stiefel fertigen lassen werde. Mich erfreut der Gedanke, dass ich ihn mit jedem meiner Schritte weiter im Dreck zertrample."

languages.text: "Lord Engizisyoncu bana layık bir rakip. Derisinden güzel bir çift bot yaptıracağım. Attığım her adımla onu daha da çamurun içine gömdüğümü bilmek beni memnun eder."
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor is a worthy adversary whose skin I'll have made into a fine pair of boots. It pleases me to know I will be trampling him further into the dirt with every step I take."
